analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/27/0x13ca82a039fb510c4110c75a833160dbc8f203e1.sol:
	Contract FixedSupplyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0x13ca82a039fb510c4110c75a833160dbc8f203e1.sol#226-236)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/27/0x13ca82a039fb510c4110c75a833160dbc8f203e1.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
